Updates of common databases (for Czech Turboveg only):

-   Popup list (database dictionary): [popup.zip](https://www.sci.muni.cz/botany/vegsci/dbase/popup.zip) (16.12.2024)

Extract the file *species.zip* and add the folder *Czechia_Slovakia_2015* to the folder /TURBOWIN/species. In the Turboveg program, assign the species list using *modify database attributes* to the specific database. Extract the file *popup.zip* to the folder /TURBOWIN/popup (old files should be rewritten).

### Instructions

Each author may enter phytosociological relevÃ©s into the database only under specific numbers assigned by the regional coordinator. If the relevÃ©s are taken from published sources, bibliographic references entered should be from within the same numerical range. The list of assigned numbers is [here](https://botzool.cz/vegsci/rozsahy.pdf).

The collaborators who were not assigned to a range of relevÃ© numbers should code their relevÃ©s from No. 1. Their relevÃ©s will be renumbered by the coordinator once they are sent to the central database.

Turboveg manual for beginners (in Czech) is [here](https://botzool.cz/vegsci/manualTv.pdf). You can download empty database [here](https://botzool.cz/vegsci/vzor.zip) with defined standard header data fields used in the Czech National Phytosociological Database. Restore the empty database to the folder /TURBOWIN/data and rename it.
